授業目的: This course is designed to introduce students to the main tools of game theory and to some of their economic applications, especially focusing on dynamic situations.
到達目標: To learn an elementary knowledge of game theory and apply it to a real-world issue.

第4回: Review of Problem Set 1 and Chapter 12 of Dutta (1999)
第6回: Review of Problem Set 2 and Chapter 13 of Dutta (1999)
第8回: Review of Problem Set 3 and Chapter 14 of Dutta (1999)
第10回: Review of Problem Set 4 and Chapter 15 of Dutta (1999)
第11回: Review the entire materials for the final exam.
第12回: Review the entire materials for the final exam.
第13回: Review the entire materials for the final exam.
トピック.授業外学習2: The main mathematical prerequisite is single-variable calculus.  The rudiments of probability and analysis are introduced as needed.

評価.教科書Required texts0:

(ISBN: 978-0262041690)
